text: Defending Your Life is a 1991 American romantic fantasy comedy movie directed by Albert Brooks (who also stars) and also starring Meryl Streep, Rip Torn, Lee Grant, Buck Henry, Gary Beach, Susan Walters. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 romantic comedy movies Category:1991 fantasy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Albert Brooks Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about reincarnation Category:Movies about the afterlife
title: Defending Your Life
